       MDP.State cn)

      • getHistogram

        public java.util.Map<MDP.State,java.lang.Double> getHistogram(int a,
                                                     MDP m)
                                                       throws MDP.InvalidMDPException
        Returns a histogram representing the transition from this state under a given input action. Note that the transition probability is over clusters in a possibly different aggregate MDP
        Parameters:
        a - : action taken
        m - : MDP used to determine the sigma algebra for the histogram
        Returns:
        an integer based histogram representing the transition map under the input s-a pair
        Throws:
        MDP.InvalidMDPException
